title: Archery
content:
Archery You gain a +2 bonus to ranged weapon attacks. Ranged Weapon Attack: An Attack Roll that determines whether you hit a target with a ranged weapon. Ranged weapon attacks are subject to High Ground Rules and have Disadvantage if you are within 1.5m of an enemy.

You gain a +2 bonus to ranged weapon attacks.
